item.title: Spring Modulith 1.3
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description:
Microservices -> Modulith trend became real.

Spring Modulith 1.3 is released. It is a framework that helps to build modular monoliths. It is a great alternative to microservices architecture. It allows developers to create modular applications with clear boundaries between modules, while still running them in a single process.

What’s new in Spring Modulith 1.3?

item.title: Maven archetypes
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description: Maven archetypes are templates that help developers quickly set up a new project with a predefined structure, files, and code for a specific type of application. It’s extremely useful for livecoding interviews when you need to quickly create a project skeleton.
